meaningMnemonic: You only have time to do <kanji>one</kanji> thing at <kanji>dawn</kanji> <vocabulary>once</vocabulary>. Dawn is really short so you can do whatever it is <vocabulary>for a moment</vocabulary>, but that's it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
